name: In re REGLAN/METROCLOPRAMIDE LITIGATION. Paul D. Hassett v. Donald Dafoe, M.D., et al. Petition of Teva Pharmaceuticals USA, Inc. and Pliva, Inc.

parties: In re REGLAN/METROCLOPRAMIDE LITIGATION. Paul D. Hassett v. Donald Dafoe, M.D., et al. Petition of Teva Pharmaceuticals USA, Inc. and Pliva, Inc.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 22nd day of August, 2012, the Petition for Permission to Appeal is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
52 A.3d 1199
In re REGLAN/METROCLOPRAMIDE LITIGATION. Paul D. Hassett v. Donald Dafoe, M.D., et al. Petition of Teva Pharmaceuticals USA, Inc. and Pliva, Inc.

Aug. 22, 2012.
